entities.description: Categories representing different responses or values in the survey data.
The count of responses for each category without being adjusted for sample weights.
The percentage representation of the unweighted frequency for each response category.
The total number of responses recorded, including valid and missing data.
The number of responses categorized as missing data.
Includes mean, minimum, maximum, and standard deviation values for the numeric responses.

relationships.description: Relates each response category to its unweighted frequency count.
Relates each response category to its percentage representation.
Indicates the total number of responses in the survey.
Specifies the portion of total responses categorized as missing data.
Describes the statistical metrics computed from the survey responses including mean, minimum, maximum, and standard deviation.
